Reference

Land Registry File

lr_url

Land registry transcaction data file

download_lr_file()

Downloads the raw land-registry file from amazon servers

Process

process_data()

Download and process data

tidy_lr_file()

Sources the data-preparation.sh script, which cleans the raw-file for commas

write_nuts()

Write the nuts classification into an Rds file

Repeated Sales Index

rsindex()

Calculate the repeated-sales index

Release

release_dates() last_release() next_release() next_release_to()

Get the release dates for the hopi

Update

update() update_monthly() update_quarterly() update_annual()

Update a version
